body.name: KOORUI Gaming Monitor, 27 inch WQHD 2560 x 1440 PC Computer Monitor, Up to 240Hz Refresh, 1ms, Adaptive Sync, HDR10, DCI-P3 90%, 144Hz Monitor, DisplayPort, HDMI, Tilt Adjustability, Black - GN05
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 3 hrs 37 mins
features: PRECISION VA PANEL – The KOORUI GN05 does what most VA panels cannot: deliver dazzlingly accurate colors with a 100% sRGB and 3000:1 Dynamic Contrast Ratio. It produces brighter whites and deeper blacks. You get true-to-life images and more gradients with 16.7 million colors. Besides, The 27 inch 2K display with the DCI-P3 90% wide color gamut brings what you’re watching like a real life.

ASTONISHING 240Hz Refresh – This sleek monitor brings you a silky smooth visuals. An astonishing 240Hz refresh rate gives you the upper hand in first-person shooters, real-time strategy games, and more. And with a 1ms response time enables lag-free gameplay. Adaptive-Sync technology ensures fluid action sequences and rapid response time. Every frame will be rendered smoothly with crystal clarity and without stutter.

WORK SEAMLESSLY – KOORUI Monitor with WQHD high resolution and virtually bezel-free on three sides, so the screen looks even more bigger for the viewer. This minimalistic design also allows for seamless multi-monitor setups that enhance your workflow and boost productivity. The stand adopts a mechanism that can be quickly assembled, allows you to adjust tilt, while VESA Wall-Mountable allows you to mount your computer monitor in any environment.

MULTIPLE GAMING PORTS – Take your pick from a wide variety of gaming and non-gaming ports, each with its own unique profile. The 2 X HDMI (v2.0) can reach 1080P@240Hz or 1440P@144Hz. 1 X DisplayPort (v1.4) can directy reach 1440P@240Hz. All ports can find a play style that works for your gaming.
3-YEAR WARRANTY – Don’t stress: you’ve got our world-class customer support, available via email. The KOORUI monitors are supported by our 3-Year Limited Warranty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars well designed monitor well integrated with windows 11
reviews.reviewText: Out of the box the fit and finish and magnetic flap/stand all feel very high quality.Without reading the manual (which wouldn't have helped anyway), I figured out how to plug it in and get it up and running in Windows 11. Pretty intuitive and well integrated process.My 13 inch HP spectre has 2 USB-c ports. This monitor also has 2 USB-c ports. A single cable between them will work with any pair of ports. however in that case the brightness is limited at 50% due to power limitation. By connecting the laptop charger to the Koorui monitor, and with a single USB-c cable leading back to the laptop, there's no longer any power limitation and I can get 100% brightness and 100% volume. The pleasant surprise for me was the single display cable, also *back charges* the laptop, although at a low wattage. I can leave the laptop in high performance mode, and the battery drains only very very slowly and can last at least 2 days.I bought two of these Koorui's, the second one used HDMI to mini HDMI with Windows 10, on an eight year old laptop. That also worked flawlessly. However, a second USB-c power source was needed to turn on the monitor at all (which it would do at full power), because HDMI doesn't deliver power.These Koorui monitor feel more comfortable to read than either of my laptops (one of which is a high end 4k screen). It has a matte finish and nice looking black to white transitions, making photos look very natural. I really like the colors and reading experience.The only downside I found was the manual. It repeats hazard warning in six languages, but doesn't tell you you need to hold down the power button for a few seconds to turn it on, because the power button doubles as menu and select button. The entire monitor settings UI is handled with only 3 buttons. It work well once you figure it out, but the "manual" doesn't have a single mention of any of this. Nor does it discuss compatibility and power requirements. Why try so hard at making a great product, but remain at such an amateur level writing the manual? That's the thing that bugged me.For gaming you only get 60hz refresh, so I haven't tried it for gaming and don't plan to use it that way. For remote learning and remote meetings, a highly portable second screen is a really nice thing to have. Overall for the extremely friendly price, I really appreciate being able to purchase this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A Pleasant Surprise with an Affordable Price Tag
reviews.reviewText: I recently stumbled upon the KOORUI 24 Inch Computer Monitor - FHD 1080P, and I have to say, it's been an amazing find, especially given the price and the fact that I had never heard of the brand before.Impressive Value for Money:Let's talk about the elephant in the room - the price. For what this monitor offers, it's an absolute steal. It delivers an FHD 1080P resolution, which looks crisp and clear without breaking the bank.Sharp Image Quality:I was initially skeptical about the image quality from an unknown brand, but boy, was I pleasantly surprised! The visuals are sharp and vibrant, making it a joy to watch movies or play games.Sleek and Modern Design:The monitor has a sleek and modern design that adds a touch of sophistication to my desk setup. It doesn't feel cheap or flimsy, which is a pleasant surprise given its affordable price.Smooth Performance:I've been using this monitor for a while now, and it has performed remarkably well. There's no noticeable lag or screen tearing during fast-paced gaming or video playback.Decent Size for Multitasking:At 24 inches, the screen size is just right for multitasking without feeling overwhelmed. I can comfortably have multiple windows open side by side without sacrificing clarity.Easy Setup:Setting up the monitor was a breeze, and it connected seamlessly to my computer. It didn't require any complicated adjustments or software installations.A Brand Worth Considering:Despite not being a well-known brand, the KOORUI monitor has certainly earned my trust. It has exceeded my expectations and has become a reliable part of my daily setup.Final Verdict:In conclusion, the KOORUI 24 Inch Computer Monitor - FHD 1080P is a true hidden gem. The price-to-performance ratio is outstanding, and the image quality is surprisingly good for a lesser-known brand. If you're on a budget but still want an excellent monitor for work or play, this one is definitely worth considering. I'm glad I took the chance on it, and it has earned my genuine praise with its impressive features and affordability. I give it a well-deserved thumbs up

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am super pleased with this monitor. My job provides only an in office computer only, no laptop for remote work. I bought a refurb laptop and a refurb one of these and I am good to go! The case that protects is and stands it up is just like the one for my iPad- it is ideal. Its so convenient to whip out along side my laptop, I hook up the power cord and one cable- easy. It's quite light on it's own. I can actually carry both in my laptop and this in my work bag- yes work bag gets heavy, but not a problem for short walks.I use it for a lot of data work, and it has worked perfectly. Great value for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Don't like this product
reviews.reviewText: The product does not come with English instructions. Had to watch YouTube to see how to work.(YouTube channel from a different brand) this one does not have any YouTube channel. So you have to guess how to use. Does not come with the cord to need to hook up your phone. Doesn't even tell you what kind of cord to buy. Does not have battery so you have to be around a plug to even use. Bad product! I wouldn't recommend this product!

Not a huge deal, just be cautious if you have cats who get up there

Es de un buen material, la pantalla se ve muy bien y buena resolución, es compacta y muy liviana. Las bocinas no son lo mejor, pero entiendo que no es el objetivo entregar un audio de calidad, pero cumplen su propósito. Esta pantalla es muy recomendable.

reviews.reviewTitle: Sharp, bright image; great for gaming or digital art.
reviews.reviewText: This monitor is in use by a frequent gamer and digital artist. It has a very clear and bright image that is excellent in every way required by those two pursuits. A great monitor for the price; highly recommended!
